data.title: Polychrome
data.meta_description: Polychrome is the "practice of decorating architectural elements, sculpture, etc., in a variety of colors." The term is used to refer to certain styles of architecture, pottery, or sculpture in multiple colors.
data.text:
Polychrome is the "practice of decorating architectural elements, sculpture, etc., in a variety of colors."[1] The term is used to refer to certain styles of architecture, pottery, or sculpture in multiple colors.

For the character from the Oz book series, see Polychrome (Oz). For the character from Nocturnals comic book, see Polychrome (Nocturnals).
